articles.description: Bengaluru led the market in terms of quarterly sales, with a 21 percent share, closely followed by Mumbai, with a 20.9 percent share. The premium segment, with apartments priced above Rs 1.5 crore, saw a 22 percent share in overall sales.

articles.title: India is taking on China in $447 billion space economy | Mint - Mint
articles.description: India’s industry is on track for significant growth. In 2020, the government eased rules for private sector satellite and rocket companies, allowing them to carry out independent space activities instead of being solely suppliers to ISRO.
articles.content: India is muscling in on the increasingly lucrative business of space, taking advantage of the geopolitical isolation of China and Russia to pitch itself as a reliable alternative to SpaceX. State-own… [+5555 chars]

articles.title: After $3 billion, Reliance and Jio raise $2 billion forex loan - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The USD 3 billion financing closed on March 31 and the add on USD 2 billion thereafter. The fund raising is the largest through syndicated term loans by an Indian corporate house in at least five years, the banking sources involved in the deal said.
